adjectives.description: unlimitless (comparative more unlimitless, superlative most unlimitless)

examples: In his essay on "Self-Reliance" Emerson urges the scattering of unlimitless largess abroad by whomsoever may possess as proof of the inexhaustible treasures of man and of nature.
